Package controllers

Provides classes for the controllers connecting the front- and back-ends in relation to the Model-View-Controller architecture
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BorrowLoansController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to borrowing loans
    ChooseCareerCardController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to choosing career cards
    ChooseHouseController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to choosing a house (on a Buy House space)
    ChoosePathController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to choosing the path (at a junction)
    ChoosePlayerController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to choosing another player (during the execution of specific types of lawsuit-related action cards)
    ChooseSalaryCardController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to choosing salary cards
    EndScreenController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to the end screen of the game, where the final stats of the players alongside the winner are displayed
    MainGameController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to the main gameplay
    PayLoansController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to paying loans
    PlayerNamesController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to asking for the usernames of the players at the start of the game
    PlayerRandSpinController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to spinning the wheel in order to dictate the amount received by a player on specific spaces or when a specific blue card is drawn
    SeeAllCardsController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to displaying all the cards of all the players: salary and career cards at the start of the game
    SeeCardsController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to displaying the cards of the current player: salary, career, and house cards
    SeeRulesController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to seeing the rules of the game
    WelcomeController
    Class providing the controller for the processes related to welcoming the players to the game and asking for the number of players
